channel.title: Small Group - Prayer
channel.itunes:summary: Small group study on Prayer, Fall 2013
channel.itunes:author: Greg Boyd

image.title: Woodland Hills Church Audio Sermons - High Quality Audio

item.title: His Song In Our Heart
item.description: Worship is important. However, worship isn't just about singing. In this sermon, Greg shows how worship takes many forms and brings many benefits to the Kingdom.
item.itunes:author: Greg Boyd
item.itunes:summary: Worship is important. However, worship isn't just about singing. In this sermon, Greg shows how worship takes many forms and brings many benefits to the Kingdom.
item.itunes:keywords: Woodland Hills Church, Greg Boyd, Tearing Down Walls, Spiritual Warfare

item.title: Living in Communication
item.description: Jesus calls us to abide in him, and we will bear much fruit. Jesus wants us to be always present with him just as God is omnipresent. However, this requires us to allow God into our lives. In this sermon, Greg shows us how to be fully present with Jesus in every moment.
item.itunes:author: Greg Boyd
item.itunes:summary: Jesus calls us to abide in him, and we will bear much fruit. Jesus wants us to be always present with him just as God is omnipresent. However, this requires us to allow God into our lives. In this sermon, Greg shows us how to be fully present with Jesus in every moment.
item.itunes:keywords: Woodland Hills Church, Greg Boyd, Tearing Down Walls, Spiritual Warfare

item.title: Imagining Prayer
item.description: Do you ever feel, during prayer, that you're talking to the ceiling more than God? Don't worry, you're not alone. In this sermon, Greg explains how using our imagination is not only a time honored way of praying, but the way in which God speaks to us in this world.
item.itunes:author: Greg Boyd
item.itunes:summary: Do you ever feel, during prayer, that you're talking to the ceiling more than God? Don't worry, you're not alone. In this sermon, Greg explains how using our imagination is not only a time honored way of praying, but the way in which God speaks to us in this world.
item.itunes:keywords: Woodland Hills Church, Greg Boyd, Tearing Down Walls, Spiritual Warfare

item.title: According to Your Faith
item.description: Continuing in our series on doubt and faith, Greg finally addresses the passages that have caused confusion about faith. He sets aside the mental gimmickry for something much more substantial and beautiful.
item.itunes:author: Greg Boyd
item.itunes:summary: Continuing in our series on doubt and faith, Greg finally addresses the passages that have caused confusion about faith. He sets aside the mental gimmickry for something much more substantial and beautiful.
item.itunes:keywords: Woodland Hills Church, Greg Boyd, Tearing Down Walls, Spiritual Warfare

item.title: Honest to God
item.description: In order to be in a relationship with another, we have to be honest with the other person. The same is true for our relationship with God. In this sermon, Greg shows how we need to be honest with God in our prayer.
item.itunes:author: Greg Boyd
item.itunes:summary: In order to be in a relationship with another, we have to be honest with the other person. The same is true for our relationship with God. In this sermon, Greg shows how we need to be honest with God in our prayer.
item.itunes:keywords: Woodland Hills Church, Greg Boyd, Tearing Down Walls, Spiritual Warfare

item.title: God Needs Prayer
item.description: If God is all-powerful, does he need our prayers to change this world? And is it even worth praying if we can't see the results? In this sermon, Greg addresses these questions as we begin a new series on prayer.
item.itunes:author: Greg Boyd
item.itunes:summary: If God is all-powerful, does he need our prayers to change this world? And is it even worth praying if we can't see the results? In this sermon, Greg addresses these questions as we begin a new series on prayer.
item.itunes:keywords: Woodland Hills Church, Greg Boyd, Tearing Down Walls, Spiritual Warfare
